Belongings

Belongings refers to the player character's inventory system in Remixed Dungeon, which includes all equipment and carried items.

Inventory Slots

  • Weapon - Main hand weapon slot
  • Armor - Body armor slot
  • Ring - Ring slot (can carry up to 2 rings)
  • Artifact - Special artifact slot
  • Quickslots - Up to 4 items for quick access
  • Backpack - General inventory space

Inventory Management

  • Gold - Currency stored in inventory
  • Keys - Dungeon keys for locked doors/chests
  • Potions - Consumable items
  • Scrolls - Consumable items with magical effects
  • Food - Items for sustenance
  • Wands - Magical items with charges

Mechanics

  • Weight - Items have weight affecting movement
  • Identification - Process of discovering item properties
  • Dropping - Getting rid of unwanted items
  • Storing - Managing limited inventory space

Strategy

  • Keep important consumables in quickslots for easy access
  • Manage weight to avoid movement penalties
  • Prioritize valuable items over common ones
  • Consider leaving non-essential items in hero's tomb after death

  • Equipment - Wearable items
  • Shops - How to manage gold for purchases
